(Beyond Personal Assistant): is an AI assistant that can help you with all your air conditioning needs. From finding the best deals on AC units to troubleshooting common problems, ypy can assist you with anything related to your air conditioning system.

Smart Cool: Smart Cool is an AI-powered air conditioning system that learns your preferences and adjusts the temperature accordingly. With Smart Coolty, you can control your AC system remotely through a smartphone app, voice commands, or even by using smart home devices like Amazon Alexa or Google Home.

Eco-Cool: Eco-Coolty is an air conditioning system that uses renewable energy sources like solar or wind power to cool your home. With Eco-Coolty, you can reduce your carbon footprint and save money on your energy bills.

(Beyond Personal Assistant):ypy is an AI-powered air conditioning system that can predict when maintenance is needed and alert you before it becomes a problem. With ypy, you can schedule maintenance appointments, receive alerts for potential issues, and even get recommendations for the best AC units based on your home's size and location.

Cool (Beyond Personal Assistant):ypy is an AI-powered air conditioning system that uses advanced algorithms to optimize the temperature in your home for maximum comfort. With Coolty, you can set your desired temperature and let the system automatically adjust it to maintain that temperature, even in extreme weather conditions.
